I cherish my Switch, as it brings me hours of entertainment on the weekends.
my favorite color is hunter green.
my favorite animal is the panda.

i fell in love this summer.
I am trying to get in shape and lose weight, but I know I can count on my friends to support me.

content.text: Hello! It's going pretty well so far, thanks for asking. How about yours?
It's going good. I'm just hanging out at home with my dog.
That sounds nice. I prefer to be alone at home, but I do love my dog.
Me too. He's the best thing that's ever happened to me. What kind of dog do you have?
He's a golden retriever. He's the sweetest dog in the world.
I love golden retrievers. They're so friendly and playful.
They're the best! How old is your dog?
He's 7 years old. He's starting to slow down a bit, but he's still my little baby.
7 years old is still pretty young. I'm sure he has a lot of life left in him.
I hope so. He's my best friend.
It sounds like you two are very close.
We are. He's always there for me, no matter what.
I'm glad I have him in my life.
